price: លើការជំនួសក្រុមផេ្សងដែលល្អជាងពួកគេទៅទៀត ហើយគ្មានអ្នកណាម្នាក់អាចយកឈ្នះយើងបានឡើយ។
arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: ʿalā an nubaddila khayran min'hum wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
